participant_1.background:
I was born in the early 80 s.
I take dance lessons once a week.
I also like old school hip hop.
My favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.
I love new kids on the block.

participant_2.background:
I dye my hair every three months.
My dream in life is to work from home.
I have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games.
I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

content.text: I'm a huge fan of old school hip hop! What are your favorite artists?
I love LL Cool J, Public Enemy, and Beastie Boys.
Those are all great artists! I also love Run-DMC and N.W.A.
I love Run-DMC too! They were my favorite group when I was growing up.
Me too! I remember when I got their album "Raising Hell" for Christmas when I was 10 years old. I played it all the time.
That's awesome! I still listen to that album all the time.
Me too! It's a classic album.
So, what other music do you like?
I also like a lot of new school hip hop. Some of my favorite artists include Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Chance the Rapper.
I like those artists too! I also like some alternative hip hop like Childish Gambino, Tyler, the Creator, and Frank Ocean.
I love Childish Gambino! I saw him in concert last year and it was amazing.
I'm jealous! I've always wanted to see him in concert.
He's a great performer. You should definitely see him if you get the chance.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play a lot of video games. I'm a huge fan of roleplaying games like World of Warcraft and Dungeons and Dragons.
I love video games too! I used to play World of Warcraft a lot, but I don't have time for it anymore.
I still play it a lot. I'm a huge fan of the game.
I know what you mean. It's a really addictive game.
It is! I've been playing it for over 10 years now.
Wow! That's a long time.
Yeah, it is. I've met a lot of great friends through the game.
That's awesome! I've met a few friends through the game too.
It's a great way to meet people.
